scripts.test:win: set USERPROFILE=%HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH%\测试路径\& CALL C:\Users\runneradmin\micromamba-root\condabin\mamba_hook.bat && micromamba activate PaddleLabel && paddlelabel --debug --port 1111 --lan
scripts.test:unix: bash -c "eval $(micromamba shell hook --shell=bash); micromamba activate PaddleLabel; HOME=~/测试路径/ paddlelabel --debug --port 1111 --lan"
scripts.unix:open: rm -r ~/3rd_party/export; rm -r ~/.paddlelabel/sample/bear/export; yarn outdated; npx cypress open --env waitAfter=3000,failFast=false
scripts.unix:openfast: rm -r ~/3rd_party/export; rm -r ~/.paddlelabel/sample/bear/export; yarn outdated; npx cypress open --env failFast=true
scripts.unix:run: rm -r ~/3rd_party/export; rm -r ~/.paddlelabel/sample/bear/export; npx cypress run --env failFast=false
